meanings.definition: A woman who serves food and drinks to customers in a restaurant.
meanings.sent1: The waitress brought us our meals with a smile.
meanings.sent2: The waitress took our orders and delivered them promptly.
meanings.sent3: The waitress accidentally spilled a drink but handled it gracefully.
meanings.sent4: She moved between tables like a graceful dancer, a waitress in motion.
meanings.sent5: The waitress's friendly demeanor made the dining experience enjoyable.

meanings.sent1: She decided to waitress at the local diner to earn extra money.
meanings.sent2: I will waitress at the café next weekend.
meanings.sent3: He tried to waitress but found it challenging to balance multiple orders.
meanings.sent4: She will waitress at the new bistro opening downtown.
meanings.sent5: Waitressing requires good memory and quick thinking skills.
